incompatible_browser:
Your browser doesn't support Zoom CSS property, for a better experience we recommend using a Chromium-based browser, like Brave or Chrome. 

More details in https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/zoom#browser_compatibility
welcome: Welcome to 8pixels' website, we are a new indie Brazilian team, developing games since before 2020.
gomaze: a game for Android with challenging stages, where you control a bunny that needs to pass through tons of dangerous robots!
vivald: a stunning desktop and mobile game that is season themed.
our_games: Check all our Android games on Google Play!
